description: Stole of white silk, lined with flesh-colored cotton, and embroidered with floral arabesques of carnations, tulips, cornflowers, etc., worked in tones of blue, green, pink, yellow and metal thread, in Opus Plumarium (embroidery stitch). A line of four silver threads, couched, and edged with thin apricot and gold cord, also couched, serpentines from one end to the other, and encloses three elaborately formed silver crosses: center, and each end. Fabric broken and much mended. Metal threads very worn. Stole dirty at center back.
title: Stole
